name: Shoaib Aman Bhati
position: IIMB PGP’25 (DML - Top 5%) | YCP Auctus (PPO) | Accenture Strategy (PPO) | IITB’20 | Ex-ICICI (Product) | Godrej
about: As a strategic thinker and data enthusiast, my recent Summer Associate role at YCP Auctus combined with 1.5+ years as a Product Manager at ICICI Bank has honed my ability to manage end-to-end Strategy projects and innovate financial products. With a foundation in Chemical Engineering from IIT Bombay, I'm currently expanding my business acumen at IIM Bangalore. My experience in strategy consulting at Godrej Industries and proficiency in Data analytics, have equipped me with a unique blend of technical and strategic competencies. I am looking to solve challenging problems and explore multiple sectors.

projects: [{"title":"Credit Card Defaulters Prediction","start_date":"Mar 2020","end_date":"Apr 2020","description":"Objective: To build a classification model to determine whether a person defaults credit card payment for the next month Ingested batches of data & did data validation to classify it into good or bad training data & finally inserted it into database Exported data from database to CSV; Preprocessed it & applied clustering algorithm to separate different clusters from data Built various models with best parameters calculated using Grid Search for each cluster; Chose best model using AUC score Deployed app on Pivotal cloud; Used similar steps for prediction data & predicted using the saved model based on cluster"},{"title":"Market Segmentation Project","start_date":"Aug 2019","end_date":"Sep 2019","description":" Pre-processed & visualized customer data using rich library like pandas & matplotlib; standardized data using sklearn library  Performed Market segmentation using K-Means clustering algorithm; optimized number of clusters using Elbow method"},{"title":"Regulating the Insurance Sector","start_date":"Feb 2019","end_date":"Apr 2019","description":" Comprehended contribution of Insurance sector to economy; inferred Untapped market segment as the major challenge  Analysed the current scenario of Indian insurance sector; predicted its contribution to India’s total savings as 35% by FY20"},{"title":"Fisheries Data Analysis","start_date":"May 2018","end_date":"Jul 2018","description":"Guide: Prof. D Parthasarathy, Humanities and Social Sciences, IIT Bombay• Analysed and compared Census Data of year 2005 and 2010 of 62 districts of 9 coastal states using R programming • Provided inferences for the decrease in the Fisheries sectors of these areas in year 2010 as compared to 2005• Inferred impact of Climate change on various factors including Population, Occupation and Crafts of Fisher folks’• Constructed graphical inferences for Active Fisher folks to execute useful operations from various packages in Python"}]
